pullrequest.title: add test timeout, already used on dev branch

content.raw: Btw, I pulled in a slightly later change to lower the test timeout to 60s.  That's because the tests on default are mostly timing out right now, and the old 4-minute timeout was making that job take a long time to run.
content.html: Btw, I pulled in a slightly later change to lower the test timeout to 60s. That's because the tests on default are mostly timing out right now, and the old 4-minute timeout was making that job take a long time to run.
